resources.string: Zoom SDK Demo
Meeting Invite Example
Remotely control a desktop using gestures
Tap with one finger
Tap the screen with one finger to click the mouse
Double tap with one finger
Double tap with one finger to double click the mouse
Long press with one finger
Press the screen with one finger to right-click the mouse
Swipe with two fingers
Swipe with two fingers to scroll up and down
Pinch with two fingers
Pinch in and out with two fingers to zoom in and out
Mouse icon
Drag the mouse icon to move the remote mouse pointer
Tap here to control %s\'s screen remotely
You cannot start screen share while the other participant is sharing.
Customized UI
Switch domain
Hide annotation button in screen share
Hide stopshare button in screen share
